title: A bike for any time and anywhere.
description: Minimal parking space and tight curves: you no longer have these worries with the Carrie. You can now ride around town with ease, just like on a normal bike, thanks to its 43 cm slim Basic Box. And, with a compact length of just two metres, there is always space for the Carrie in every bike store room.

uploadMetadata.Variants: Touring, Vario, City, City - Anise - Stock

Powerful Bosch Motor 9. Exceptional Ride Comfort 10. Optimized Comfort Over All Terrains 11. Optimized Comfort Over All Terrains 12. Sustainable Cargo Solutions 13. Environmentally Friendly Transport 14. Environmentally Friendly Transport
How to Fix:
1. Use the Card Creator to recreate each card individually
2. Each card should be in its own column (shared.feature-1-card, shared.feature-2-card, etc.)
3. Export with correct format: 1 card per cell
Note: This placeholder represents 14 cards that need to be recreated with the correct format.
